messages: daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (09:41): off hand anyone know of the pros and cons of say smp dual core machines vs say single die multiple cores ?
4fe573ff41aefb42de56ddf2771295ea (09:43): by 'smp dual core' do you mean multiple single core CPUs?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (09:44): rodrickbrown,  opterons bench about the same core per core..  2x 1 core ==  dual core cpu.

75dd2071a30b7c94d9361f05f06d524c (09:48): rodrickbrown: depends very much on the application you're running.  the major benefit of multiple cores on the same die is lower latency for coherency related messaging
daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (09:49): yeah i figured as much

75dd2071a30b7c94d9361f05f06d524c (09:50): if you can schedule two threads which cooperate to process some common dataset which fits within their combined caches you can see a big speedup over traditional smp
daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (09:52): shared cache I think would cause more cache thrashing under heavy load... not too sure though
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (09:52): opterons don't have a shared cache
75dd2071a30b7c94d9361f05f06d524c (09:53): it certainly could if the associativity wasn't increased simultaneously
75dd2071a30b7c94d9361f05f06d524c (09:54): and, yeah, opterons just hook the caches into the crossbar for very fast core-to-core transfers
daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (09:54): james i was talking in general not specific to opteron i'm actually really excited about intels road map
daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (09:54): you know what i ment :)
fd686aa46da1e08426b09b3eaf579ed2 (10:03): anyone from Aus know what Sun's main switchboard phone number is?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (10:05): river_, and they will respond, "sorry  the janitor is busy at the moment"
33ed8c96b2b06385e426e5bcf6935cf8 (10:05): river_: on a concall right now

d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (10:24): drdoug: American Television tells us it's the worst possible job.

c2ae398a47ee9e4a69021a615e106d2d (10:26): They like to have problems. It keeps them employed
d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (10:27): It isn't management's problem though... it's our problem.
d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (10:27): Haha. I understood the problem before I signed on, it is only the scope of the pain that is now pitifully apparent.
c2ae398a47ee9e4a69021a615e106d2d (10:28): Now you know some of the crap I put up with
d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (10:28): Anyway, these accounts won't create themselves.
daa08b04a71644cbce3e6e7e5aeeb58e (10:39): This operation is not supported by this application for systems with local zones.
4fe573ff41aefb42de56ddf2771295ea (10:39): are you running the latest smpatch?  i heard rumours it had been fixed
